section.name: Apache Turbine Project Board Report, February 2011

subsection.name: Status
subsection.p: The Turbine project has as usual seen fairly low levels of activity in the last quarter.
The Turbine project has no board-level issues at this time.

subsection.name: Project Branding Board Report Checklist - TBC
subsection.p: The requirements are acknowledged, but not yet addressed.

ul.li: Project Naming And Descriptions : use proper Apache forms, describe product, etc.
Website Navigation Links : navbar links included, link to www.apache.org included
Trademark Attributions : attribution for all ASF marks included in footers, etc.
Logos and Graphics : include TM, use consistent product logo on your site
Project Metadata : DOAP file checkedin and up to date

subsection.name: Community changes
subsection.p: Ludwig Magnusson has been voted in as a Turbine Committer.
No new PMC members were voted in since the last board report.
Thomas Vandahl has been elected as the new PMC chair.

subsection.name: Turbine core project
subsection.p: The Turbine core project continues with occasional commits.
A Milestone release is planned for the near future. A user poll led to the decision to switch to JDK 6.0 for further development.
No beta or final releases were made since the last board report.

subsection.name: Fulcrum component project
subsection.p: Work on migrating the build process of the Fulcrum components to Maven 2 continues.
No beta or final releases were made since the last board report.

subsection.name: META project
subsection.p: There has been no activity on the META sub-project in this quarter.
No beta or final releases were made since the last board report.
